title: Reflection typeface Dior research
content:
See my _Reflection_ character with the beautiful Natalia photographed by Paolo Roversi in an artistic personal research that I did for Christian Dior griffe:  
 [www.stefanseifert.com/templates/Chart\_12/Character.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20150420003011/http:/www.stefanseifert.com/templates/Chart_12/Character.html "www.stefanseifert.com/templates/Chart\_12/Character.html")  
Click and drag to see the letters more close up.
